message: Welcome! This is a high-quality product, valued at $120 by our discerning customers. For a limited time, we're offering it to you for $100. Don't miss out on this exceptional value!
I'd be happy to be the first buyer! Since you say it's high-quality and I value it at $120, I'll take the chance.

Given its lower value, we're still offering it for $100. Please be aware that its actual worth might be less than our usual offerings.

I won't buy the product. Given the information that the product is being sold at a special promotional rate due to its condition, it suggests that the product is likely of low quality. With a 66.67% chance of being low quality and only being worth $0 to me if it is, the risk outweighs the potential benefit of it possibly being a high-quality product worth $120.
